SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NOTICE_DEL_FL = 'N'

MM. DD') NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, NOTICE_DEL_FL , LAG(NOTICE_NO) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) PRE_NOTICE_NO , LAG(NOTICE_TITLE) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) PRE_NOTICE_TITLE , LEAD(NOTICE_NO) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) NEXT_NOTICE_NO , LEAD(NOTICE_TITLE) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) NEXT_NOTICE_TITLE FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NOTICE_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO ) A WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
